nodes.text: The Bith system was a star system located in the galaxy's Core Worlds region. Positioned near the Abregado system, it contained an astronomical object inhabited by members of the sentient Bith species. Though they shared a name, the Bith were actually native to Clak'dor VII, a planet in Colu system of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. In the year 22 BBY, a task force commanded by Jedi General Anakin Skywalker and Admiral Wullf Yularen was deployed to the Bith system to secure it as a staging ground for the Republic Navy during the early Clone Wars.
